recipe.title: Yellow Gazpacho/Virgin Bloody Mary
ingredients: 1 1/2 lb yellow tomatoes, quartered (use red if yellow not available)
1 cup cucumber, peeled, seeded and diced
1 cup red bell pepper, cored, seeded and diced
instructions: Puree first nine ingredients in a blender until smooth. Refrigerate 1 hour. Strain through a fine sieve, pressing solids to release all liquid. Put liquid in blender and add cucumber, bell pepper, onion, celery salt, Worcestershire and lemon juice; process briefly, then refrigerate. If desired, wet rims of 4 glasses, combine coarse salt and parsley on a saucer and dip glass rims in mixture. Fill with gazpacho; serve immediately.
